Description: Body sherd of Attic pottery Gordion cup; interior: glazed black; exterior: reserved handle zone with narrow black band at bottom; glaze lower wall; inscription in handle zone.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Sanctuary of Aphrodite (Naukratis), Context Φ8(?)
Curator's comments: The sherd belongs to the same vase as British Museum 1888,0601.237, 1888,0601.324, 1948,0815.3 and 1948,0815.4. See Hirayama, H. 2010 Kleitias and Attic Black-figure Vases in the Sixth Century B.C., 89 and pl. 25, A17,7.
Bibliographic references: Vase / Catalogue of Vases in the British Museum (B601.4.3)
